projects.title: Space Invaders
projects.description: Final project for Code 201 at Code Fellows. This Space Invaders clone was built by our team over the course of a week using pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript, with a focus on harnessing Web API's such as Canvas and Web Storage.

projects.title: Snake
projects.description: Personal project made using pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript. This was mainly a study in working on CSS Grid and DOM state to build out randomizers and collision detection. It's a fully playable 'clone' of Snake! It's also got a few custom themes!

projects.title: Minimalist Thermostat
projects.description: This is a card built for Home Assistant, a home automation control system. I have multiple thermostats that need controlling throughout my house, and I wasn't happy with the UI/UX in any of the built-in cards or any available through public repositories, so I built my own! This card currently runs on my home system, and my wife says I did a very good job :)
